subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_01EA_01C9D94F.12021560
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

This is what I think true EVP is Eric. Not and actual sound emitting a soun=
d wave in the environment, but EMF manipulation in order to imprint the mes=
sage directly to the recording media. It doesn't matter if it is analog or =
digital.

If the sound that is recorded emitted a sound wave in the physica=
l environment, then it is really a disembodied voice, and not true EVP.

  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Eric VanDuzer 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:16 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] =
Re: I have a question.





  Actually that I would buy into  But the quest=
ion I have when you say "tape" are you talking old analog tape or digi reco=
rding.  Here is the reason I believe it can be do "real-time".  As you all =
know we use electromagnetic Field detectors in field investigations.  If a =
spirit can manipulate that with to show that they are there by giving off a=
 EM field whose to say they can't manipulate a magnetic strip of a tape or =
even the electronics in a Digi recorder to speak in "real-time".



  On We=
d, May 20, 2009 at 1:01 PM, Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrote=
:





    Okay I have another one for you to think about.. I tape a sessio=
n and review it later..  even a day later.  Upon review the message that co=
mes over is about something that =91just happened=92 while I was reviewing =
or happened after taping?  Is it possible that spirit can manipulate the re=
cording AFTER recording has stopped or even manipulate the audio while revi=
ewing?



    An give you an example of this I was recording one day and I =
reviewed the audio the next day.  While reviewing =96 about half way throug=
h =96 the message =93Your mother is calling=94 was found.  I saved it and m=
oved on and within two seconds my mom called.  You say it is a coincidence =
except that I hadn=92t spoken to my mother in over a year.  During this sam=
e conversation with her =96 we sorta made amends and I told her the story o=
f the =91secret=92 I had found out about a family member having a child out=
 of wedlock in the late 1920s.  Quick backstory.. I found out about this ou=
t-of-wedlock birth through my genealogy research and contacted spirit throu=
gh the box and I was promptly told to keep it secret and which I promised t=
o do=85



    Well in this conversation with my mom after not speaking for=
 a year I told her what I had found out.  When the telephone conversation e=
nded with my mom=85 I was amazed that the recording had told me she would c=
all right be fore she did =96 even though the audio was recorded the previo=
us day.  I proceeded to go back to reviewing the audio and the very first t=
hing I heard was:  THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET =96 YOU LIED.



    Ma=
ybe they can manipulate =91real-time=92 literally????



    k




--------=
--------------------------------------------------------------------

    F=
rom: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of =
April Abercrombie
    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:36 AM


    To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com

    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.




=




    2 different things happening-that's why. When you get EVP that ever=
yone understands, it is outward, in the environment. Not a communication th=
rough subconscious means.



    EVP that people swear they hear, but noone=
 else can make sense, may be a message to them via subconscious means. That=
 isn't to say that ALL EVP's like this are true messages, I am sure alot ar=
e just matrixing.



    But then that is how the art of scrying starts-mat=
rixing. Like the Rorschach tests. The images you matrix with those gives th=
e psychologist an insight into your mind.



    By gazing into a dark, ref=
lective surface, you start to see cloudy images. At first, you will just be=
 matrixing faces in the clouds and not getting much substance. Try it, you =
will see what I am saying. With practice, you start to see clear, concise i=
mages.



    I think that is what happening with audio as well.



    We =
already know for a fact pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual sti=
mulus.



      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: Eric VanDuzer 

=
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:=
19 AM

      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



      yes I u=
nderstand its personal to that particular individual but why can't I hear i=
t.  I have gotten some very personal EVPs through the traditional investiga=
tion way (not through a box or anything of that matter) that all others hav=
e heard.

      On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 12:15 PM, April Abercrombie <april@=
abercrombieghostresearch.com> wrote:



      "If one person is not meant t=
o hear it they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that =
one right yet)." 



      I don't know for sure about that one either, but=
 I am not ready to discount it either, especially since I stumbled across t=
he possibility of audible scrying. But I am sure alot of people don't belie=
ve in scrying at all either.



      What makes it a possibility to me is =
that so many people are hearing things that are very personal, but stuff th=
ey would not have come up with on their own.





        ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 

        From: Eric VanDuzer 

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com 

        Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:09 AM

        Subject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



        I think that is the problem I =
am having though Jim.  When you say "work them over till you hear them"  to=
 me I should not have to work them over till I hear them.  Yes taking out t=
he ambient and background noise is one thing.  But if you just keep on list=
ening to them with different enhancements you are bound to hear something (=
matrixing).  If one person is not meant to hear it they won't hear it (I gu=
ess I am not quite ready to believe that one right yet).  I think you all k=
now what I am getting at.  

        On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 9:11 PM, James=
 W. Hyslope <clockdryve@...> wrote:



        Well, for myself...I d=
on't "clean" them up to much because I really don't know HOW :) (well a lit=
tle bit)Since I've only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT if you can clean=
 up something to where you can FIND what was there to begin with "you have =
done no harm" I hear alot more than others I guess, and I haven't enhanced =
many of my evp's.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I DO promise you wil=
l hear what I say is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if you are able to =
clean it up with better software (please do for others too) I will be more =
than happy to "listen" where I made a mistake...I can only LEARN from it :)=
 I have done some DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's...from the beginin=
g I could only hear clicks and thumps.....but after messing with that area,=
 eventually I would hear the true voices (and can tell if male or female...=
approximate age) and understand the mood also....these where extreamly modi=
fied, and I feel that I could NOT have added enough "simple" enhancements t=
hat would ADD a voice....full of emotion and distinct syllables :) And some=
 just can't hear them for what ever reason be it equipment that is used to =
hear (pc-headphones-speakers-ears) know one has the perfect match of all th=
ese things. Check out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the files section....work th=
em over till you hear them. I really can't do much more :)--- In EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com, Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@...> wrote:
        >
        > Now=
 I may be biased to the "investigation" way of doing things. I do clean
   =
     > up evps if I hear something and can't make it out do to ambient nois=
e. So
        > hear is my question. When do you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't=
 to much
        > enhancing "taint" the results? To me the more enhancing =
you do the less
        > convincing it becomes. I hope noone finds this of=
fensive, it is not meant
        > to be I am just really curious. The way =
I look at it is that if you have to
        > do so much enhancing to find =
anything, was there really something there to
        > begin with. Are we =
just making ourselves believe there is something there??
        > 
       =
 > Eric
        >
